website_summaries.verdict: A budget alternative pair of motorcycle gloves to choose if you want more grip on the handlebars.
pros: Leather fabric ensures a solid grip on most rubber handlebars
Thumb and forefinger tips use a special fabric to enable smart device use without having to take the glove off
Hidden plastic knuckle armor offers protection
cons: Leather feels tight on the sides of the hand

customer_reviews.title: "XL" is more like a 'large'
customer_reviews.text: measured at 9 in and picked EXTRA LARGE. They arrived as a "LARGE" but were clearly marked "XL" on the bag - once I shined a LIGHT through the back as another 'label' had been overlaid on the original "FXC" label. The palm was tight, the fingers were short by over 1/4 inch, the knuckle protector was 1/2 knuckle too narrow and I could not open my thumb wide (due to lack of material) which means it was either only a LARGE for normal people; OR it was a WOMEN's fit!? giving them away as they do NOT show XXL!!! They are otherwise as described...
customer_reviews.author: blh

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price, good for Socal Spring Weather
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy made, and comfortable. Seem to run true to size for me. I used them for motorcycling to/from work in SoCal springtime weather and they are a good combination of protection and warmth for the 50's - low 70's They aren't warm by any measure at the low end of the range but they keep you from freezing and are comfortable enough to wear in highly variable spring temps that we have every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rauch

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are as expected and advertised. Tried out the touch screen as stated on the description. They work flawlessly, able to manipulate GPS, Cell and anything else that is touchscreen. They were a bit tight at first but, gradually started to break in. So keep that in mind at first. I would like to see more protection on the palm area, since if one goes down on the bike, its usually hot tarmac and hands will usually be the first to get the brunt of the hit/slide. But, other than that. Good gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION!  SIZE runs REALLY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear gloves that are sized LARGE or EXTRA LARGE. These were ordered as EXTRA LARGE (although I couldn't find a tag sewn into them to verify that.) Not only were they extremely tight, but the fingers were not nearly long enough. Very uncomfortable. Other than that the quality as new looks decent. I'll pass them along to my biker grandson who rides with me now and then. He wears MEDIUM gloves and these should fit him just right. How difficult should it be for a manufacturer to make a product that matches a standard size anyway???
customer_reviews.author: PlaneOldStuff

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss.
customer_reviews.text: My first pair was amazing. true to fit .arrived in 2 days. Had it for a year. Went "Missing" so i had to order a second pair (Perforated). Second pair took longer (2-3 weeks) ripped within seconds of owning it. I contacted Vender and they sent another pair in Solid (1 week including weekend), Would've had to wait another 2-3 weeks for another perforated set. I am very impatient. The solids runs bigger. Both are are touch screen. (Which is awesome) These are no ICONs but def a nice pair. You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarame Y.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but decent gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and fit tight so they don't really hinder you like other gloves I've worn. I really like the fit, and I am on my second pair. The first lasted about a year and the stitching started letting go. It's a shame because the material held up fine, so if you are reading this FXC inspect the stitching better or use better thread. Hoping I have better luck this time around, because I haven't found anything that fits nice like these.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Finally!! Gloves for wide hands and short fingers!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! Gloves for wide hands and short fingers!! Saw a review from someone else that the thumb was too short. I usually get stuck with gloves that the thumb is too long. So, when I saw that, I clicked purchase quick. They fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty shabby...
customer_reviews.text: Left residue all over my hands after wearing. Hope they stop doing that, they fit nice otherwise. Actually, the ends of the fingers are painful, but again, not having a great time with these anyhow.. Edit: Review updated to 2/5 stars from 1/5. Residue (after getting caught in a thunderstorm :P) has seemed to stop. Getting more comfortable as they wear in (or maybe I'm getting used to it), look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great! My only complaint is the Velcro wrist straps. I would have liked buttons or something other then Velcro as after only a few rides its already losing its grip, but that was to be expected. Not much to say really there comfortable, provide a good grip on the throttle, and don't need to constantly adjust when riding. Good leather gloves quality is very nice especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cr4$h0v3r1d3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Riding Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. Gloves are comfortable. Work well on on my Garmin Zumo touchscreen and for pushing buttons on my Sena 50s helmet communicator. However, it does take a little bit of practice to get good using them for touch and buttons. Broke them in on a 3 day ride in NC. Hands stayed warm, but I have heated grips and wind blocking fairing wings and large windscreen. Fingers would probably be cold without that wind protection. Overall I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: deni scarskee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because I thought they were well made
customer_reviews.text: After a week of used I got cut in a rain storm, I got home to find muy hands literally turned black from the gloves. Also once I air dried them there is about a 1 inch tear where the hard knuckles meet the glove on my right hand. Disappointed because I thought they were well made.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: It's good. But not when it rains.
customer_reviews.text: The glove looks as great as the pictures show and the fabric has some good resistance, but it has some issues, though. I think the index finger is a bit short and when it rains, your hands get black. It doesn't happen for the first time only. Whenever it rains, the black color dyes your hands, and it's very hard to get rid of it. So, despite the gloves being kind of water resistant, the dyed color is not and that is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Téo Marcus

customer_reviews.title: I wear Large gloves. With these, the fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear Large gloves. With these, the fingers are a little short. If I tried these at a store, would not have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for summer and city use.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather, a few little that i had expected, but with a 8 or more time of using, they stretch the enough for a short rides witout awkward you. I recommend it for the price and the protection that have just for the city, not for racetrack or high speed 112mph or more..
customer_reviews.author: s4nk

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of this glove. They fit well and seem to be made well. They are not premium gloves and are priced as such. I wouldn't use them to race on a track, but to keep my hands from slipping on the throttle, they are perfect, and give some protection for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Great GLOVES!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves work for what they are designed to do. But my hands always feel clammy afterwards. After washing the gloves and letting them break in, I take back what I said. These gloves are PHENOMENAL!!! Worked great during the fall months but definitely not for summer haha.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good knuckle protection, but a little big for the size
customer_reviews.text: Fingers are a bit too long for smaller size. Gloves is not a tight fit as what I want. Gloves will bleed some black material on your hand (difficult to wash off). I used more than 5 rides already and still get my hand blacken every time. Other than that, the knuckle protection seems to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: yasky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Riding Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and a very well made glove! Breathable and the mesh index finger tip allows use of a cell phone. Good knuckle protection with the sewn-in hard plastic guards. great, light weight riding glove...highly recommended! Don F. - San Pedro, CA
customer_reviews.author: Don F.

customer_reviews.title: it's ok not great
customer_reviews.text: I mean for the price they are better than nothing. the knuckles don't match my knuckles so i hope i don't crash with these on. Better than nothing but they aren't like the gloves with gel all over. I'm not sure these are going to be amazing in a crash. They are better than nothing and offer a little protection from cold but not a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Stimpy

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well in a Crash
customer_reviews.text: I crashed at low speed (<10 MPH) yesterday while wearing these gloves (along with a helmet, jacket, leather boots) and they worked very well for me. My left glove was shredded right over the knuckle armor, but my hand and knuckles are okay. Just a small bruise and a scrape on my arm. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: They Turn Hands Black
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove, but they turn my hands black. Regular soap does not remove the stain from my hands. I even tried washing the gloves in the sink hoping it would help, but it continues. Guess I will go back to my old gloves until I can find better ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jmc

customer_reviews.title: They stain your hands!  :  /
customer_reviews.text: Gave it two stars because the gloves look nice. That said when I took them off I noticed my hands were stained purple. I wore them during a hot day and my hands were sweating but that’s expected. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: George J

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels good, seems to be quality but they were shorter ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a very long time to deliver, looks and feels good, seems to be quality but they were shorter even after following the measurement guide. I was offered a replacement but I received a refund from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amr Ragab

customer_reviews.title: Solidly constructed, has held up for a few months ...
customer_reviews.text: Solidly constructed, has held up for a few months now with no sign of any wear, comfy and sized perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: O.G.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband to use on his Harley. He was in an accident and they did a good job at protecting him.
customer_reviews.author: ashli aldama

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: These didn't last more than four hours before the velcro strap totally came off one of the gloves! They also left a fairly gross black residue all over my hands, and blistered both hands between my thumb and forefinger.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove have no choice but to wear but fingers are all mis shapened
customer_reviews.author: Nilo ace

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated
customer_reviews.text: I use them as a passenger on a bike. Keeps my hands safer in the event I'm in an accident and still allows me to use my phone to take pictures as we travel.
customer_reviews.author: c.adams

customer_reviews.title: These gloves had the potential to be very good. I purchased XL
customer_reviews.text: These gloves had the potential to be very good. I purchased XL, and the fit is OK. except the fingers are too short to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: recluse

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wear them all the time, feel comfortable as should durable they will only last about 15 to 20 mins in weather under 30° but that depends on how much of a warm person you are.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit well and seem gid quality. The touch screen portion seems "iffy".
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Velcro strap is wack
customer_reviews.text: Velcro no longer stay in place. Glove has no longevity. I took back my 4 stars. Will never waste money on cheap gloves ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Nazaire

customer_reviews.title: ... for a few weeks now and they're still in good condition happy with the product thank
customer_reviews.text: I received the gloves on time I've had them for a few weeks now and they're still in good condition happy with the product thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order a larger size than usual
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were very small based on sizing chart.
customer_reviews.author: Joey T.

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty close to the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty close to the picture. Fit was good, maybe a bit on the small side. Super uncomfortable while riding tho. There is a weird pad they put right at the base of the fingers that makes riding in these for longer than 30 mins unbearable. Can’t recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Solid gloves
customer_reviews.text: Work better in cooler weather than my vented ones. Haven't gone down in them but they seem decently made.
customer_reviews.author: MaksV

customer_reviews.title: The sizing is pretty on the money
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are way nicer than I expected! The sizing is pretty on the money, I ordered XLs expecting them to be a little loose but are actually a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morton

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. My fingers are a little shorter and my palms a little wider than what most gloves are made, but these fit perfectly and the knuckle guards fit perfectly. I wear a large.
customer_reviews.author: Will Savell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: touchscreen coating on fingers wore off after only two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Howitz

customer_reviews.title: Size for me was good. I have not worn these gloves in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Dye from gloves turned my hands black. After several uses during the summer, my hands are not as dark. Size for me was good. I have not worn these gloves in the rain yet so I hope my hands don't get dyed again. So far the gloves have held up and for the price, I would consider buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, poor seam
customer_reviews.text: I liked them, good fit, nice comfort. However, after only 3 weeks, one of the seams separated from one of the gloves. I'm not a hard core user, so this probably should not have happened.
customer_reviews.author: CinjinSmythe

customer_reviews.title: Black hands
customer_reviews.text: I apparently wore these gloves for too long and they turned my hands black.
customer_reviews.author: DWMP

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft material and works well with smartphones (very important). Knuckle pockets fit well. Wish the finger length would have 1mm longer.
customer_reviews.author: egalot

customer_reviews.title: Will update in a few months
customer_reviews.text: First impression 5 starts feels great looks great size is accurate at least for me. 10/30/18
customer_reviews.author: Candice shore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good fitting gloves, make sure you measure your hands per the instructions and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive motorcycling gloves
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and finish, once broken in. I probably ordered a size too small, but I prefer to have them snug rather than loose. Also, the padding at the top of the right palm pinches a little when I roll on the throttle sometimes, but I can adjust my grip whenever that happens. They do keep out the cold well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Oakley

customer_reviews.title: better to try on gloves before buying them
customer_reviews.text: large was very small. returned product and was charged 7.95 for postage. better to try on gloves before buying them.
customer_reviews.author: geofleet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, durable.
customer_reviews.text: They've held up well with repeated use. Nicely made, good leather. Touchscreen-fingers still work fine.
customer_reviews.author: KC Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Very confortable
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Very confortable, fit snug but so confortable are build on real leather, the Velcro don't make damages on the fábrica, for me great gloves!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Dress for the slide!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves for the money. If only I would have been wearing them during my accident. DOH!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Seem nice except the thumbs are long
customer_reviews.text: Seem nice except the thumbs are long. I usually wear a large and ordered the XL according to the size chart and it fit well besides the longer thumbs.
customer_reviews.author: average human

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves great price!
customer_reviews.text: These fit me nice, do what I need, and look good!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Stitching isn't great
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these but a few weeks after I got them I went to take them off buy pulling the fingers and it ripped open and now the finger is exposed and I can't use it anymore if you get it be careful taking it off
customer_reviews.author: Sanel

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my dad and he loved them. Fit great and he loved that he was able to use his phone while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, not top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, not top of the line, but amazing for the price. pretty well made. The seam on some of the fingers hit me weird when I grip the bars, but i got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Took 3 weeks to get and l couldn't wear them gloves weren't even a matching pair
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered XL for my husband who wears size 9. They BARELY fit me, a size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They need to pay a little more attention to details.
customer_reviews.text: The left glove fit is spot on. My only gripe is the right glove knuckle protection is cut wrong under the leather. It doesn’t fit right and I bet they will give out right there.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Wore them twice and already a hole in them. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Green

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger size then what you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only put them on for figment, I ordered a size large because of the chart says Large would fit, they are smaller in sizes so order a larger size then you wear. Only review I have now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Silkwood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this glove it's comfortable and the leather is of great quality. Buying another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves for the bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves for the price. Very well put together, quality materials, perfect for long rides. The touch screen usability is good and it looks like it would protect nicely in a crash or slide although I’m not interested in finding out.
customer_reviews.author: Cody MorneaultMorneault

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are a great value. Have held up well so far. Good fit
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Measured my hands and ordered to fit. Fit is a little tight but may stretch in over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect summer glove for a cruiser
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit great, look nice, and are comfortable in the summer. The fit was exactly as stated, but the finger length are a tad shorter than with my other gloves. That said, they are the best fitting gloves that I have.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lo

customer_reviews.title: only one issue so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good clove. Seems to run a little small imo i wear a large glove most days at work they seem to fit fine. Got these and wow just a little snug. So if your ordering may want to think about ordering up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Danny M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but unsure on durability
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and form to your hand as leather gloves do. I recently had a spill on my bike and the gloves tore at the seams right open. This was only after a couple of weeks of riding with them.
customer_reviews.author: Osayi

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Easy on and off. Well padded and well designed. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Laffond

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves, wished they went a little more on my wrist but over all good gloves
customer_reviews.author: Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly but definitely don't recommend riding in the cold with them
customer_reviews.author: R. D.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fit and the fact that I can still ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit and the fact that I can still have functionality with my mobile phone without taking off my gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin Ross

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the money. Touch finger is peeling off the index finger after a month of use
customer_reviews.author: Nick Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gloves, fitment was perfect and they feel like ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gloves, fitment was perfect and they feel like a quality product, not cheaply made.. Very comfortable, breathe well and you cant beat the price. Would recommend to anyone looking for motorcycle gloves of this style.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: They leave your hands black!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are horrible. They don’t fit well, and they leave your hands black after a few hours. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It's all good.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable gloves; just like a second skin. The break in period was short. The "knuckle armor"" is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brad McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Sized a little tight but soaked in oil they loosened up and do as advertised
customer_reviews.author: John H Bence

customer_reviews.title: Good product, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and quality. Ease of using your phone is great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Yetman

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the $$
customer_reviews.text: the fit was spot on. Even in cold weather it provides good warmth. By no means a winter glove but good comfort. I'd buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Waldense

customer_reviews.title: Good looking glive
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, the large is a bit tight but should loosen up with some wear. Will be another month before I can try them out on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable. Just got, so can’t comment on durability
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine Gloves. I couldn't be happier Just what I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: RayJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves and on time
customer_reviews.text: Wow they fit perfectly I wear s large bought large and they fit perfectly they look and feel bad ass I like them a lot made nice to finally baught sumthing and don't feel roped off
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I ride a lot and use a smart phone for navigation, but also music. Don't have to remove my gloves while riding now. Seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, a little too much material bunched for seams in fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sore hand!
customer_reviews.text: The reinforced knuckle rubbed on one of my hands making it very sore after just a couple of hours riding. Not impressed so returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Darn good quality. I'm pretty picky and high standards. Worth more than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam N

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very nice quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedsterJohnny

customer_reviews.title: good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Little short on the wrists. My wrists get sunburned with these. Otherwise, good deal.
customer_reviews.author: TJW

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Wore mine for the first time today on a 60 mile ride in °55 weather. The worked great an my hands weren't freezing there or back. Great quality for $20.

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the gloves are excellent,also the price. The size is accurate and my husband loves them:)

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves with Velcro wrist lock on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of gloves with Velcro wrist lock on the inside...arrived on time the day before my motorcycling class.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than you would think bought xxl but to small

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves excellent for the price do not think ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves excellent for the price do not think about it super good quality gloves for the price

customer_reviews.title: does not small like leather, but looks and feels like it
customer_reviews.text: They look well made, but have a strange chemical smell to them, does not small like leather, but looks and feels like it, have not rode with them yet, we will how they hold up.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Just got it...the Velcro attachment was bad. put them on first ride and the so called leather start tearing apart. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: TGY

customer_reviews.title: Damn near perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. Runs a tad small. I usually wear a large, I ordered XL and they were a bit tight (especially in the thumbs) until I broke them in.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. I thought xlarge would be a little bigger. But still very good

customer_reviews.title: Decent gloves. The touch fingertips work decently. But ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent gloves. The touch fingertips work decently. But you can tell the gloves are not the highest quality. I would save up a few more dollars and buy something a bit nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fitting Great for my both Tight/ loose just right !
customer_reviews.author: Willie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather. I have bought several other gloves but these are the best. Knuckle armour in the right place. Wind proof.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sizemore

product_meta.title: FXC Touch Screen Full Finger Motorcycle Leather Gloves Men's Premium Protective motorbike
feature_bullets: :) Ensure a proper fit: Measure your hand with a tape measure around the knuckles of your hand. M: 7.5-8.0 inch , L: 8.0-8.7 inch , XL: 8.7-9.5 inch .

:) An extension of your body, the Pursuit glove melts away from conscious thought and lets you become the surgeon of the urban street. With supple sheepskin leather conforming to your hand and hidden plastic knuckle armor for protection, subtlety and control never felt and looked so good. Combine extensive perforation for all day comfort with reinforced goatskin palm to combat those precarious.
:) Thumb and forefinger With a smart tip to touch screen, even when you wear the glove, you can still use your mobile phone. We have Mesh / Solid, you can choose your favorite style.
:) Kindly Reminder：In order to satisfy yourself, avoid too long exchange times, please carefully measure and compare the size of the chart. thank you ! ^_^
